articles.title: Chiefs roar back to win after Raiders’ questionable two-point attempt - The Guardian
articles.description: Patrick Mahomes threw four touchdown passes to Travis Kelce, the Chiefs overcame a 17-point deficit and KC extended their mastery of the Raiders
